title: New to OCE from NA Looking for People to Play With
body:
I just got to platinum on NA and an aussie friend stopped playing so he gave me his account so I now have an OCE account in Bronze. I am a support and jungle main and I have 0 friends on OCE now so I am looking to make some friends to play with. I own a Teamspeak 3 server as well.

If anyone wants to play, add me!

My teamspeak server:  ts.thefastforce.com

replies.body:
I'm Gold 4 in NA
moved to OCE, currently Silver 1.
Can fill any role, best with supp/mid.
IGN: Juicy Cupcake
keen to duo up?

Yeah bro,
I was busy on some assignments, will back to game next week :), add me ^^

IGN is tirolei, used to play on 230 ping on NA, then with the server move it hit 260 and I accepted my fate, looking for some people to climb with and just enjoy the game with, at gold 5, usually play mid but willing to try my best elsewhere too.
Add me as well, any people who are looking to play!
no one gave him this account it was hacked and have only just got it back now! My summner name has been changed by this fake person and riot is sorting it for me now! dont be fooled by this guy
So I started at bronze 5 at 0 LP, and I went on like a 25 game win streak and now I am Silver 5. Still got a ways to go to get up to plat where I am on NA.
Anyone else I can add? I am working my way out of Bronze. :)
Thanks guys I added people!
Still looking for more people to play with. <3
Ill be glad 2 play with u. My ping went from 200 in NA to 20 in OCE, I live in Australia. I was Gold 5 in NA. would luv to play with you. Would you want to join our ranked team? Also do u have skype?
im keen to play bro b5 myself but am decent in all roles. waiting for next season to go up lol.
I was Gold 5 in NA just switched to OCE, need someone with high elo, I would be glad u play with u Strungout and add u to ranked team. I have plenty of friedns with high MMR's but r stuck in bronze
Anyone else I can play with? I am platinum on NA. Wanting to find a friend to go up in ELO with.
Would be interested to hear your thoughts on relative toxicity
OCE has been SO toxic and I see the word "Cunt" at least once every game lol

Dont get too upset about that word. It has cultural context. Most mums in australia use that as a term of endearment.

How about surrenders afks and trolling? Any difference?
Lol, a couple Australian friends told me that cunt is used a lot there. And well I went from playing in Platinum with 44 ping to Bronze with 188 ping. Still pretty easy to carry.
I just transferred from NA to OCE due to the server changes, same boat with no friends though.
What server changes? My ping on NA is 44 now but my ping on OCE is 188. Which is still playable I don't mind. Sorry I didn't have my headphones on when you came in the TS.
you can add me if you want
Thanks I'll add you.
